attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Set more people-focused economic targets: for example
Economic Growth > 5%/ year
Reduction in Council tax by 5% / year
Reduction in VAT by 5% / year
Reduce house prices by better planning management, say by 10% / year
Generally free up people spending and give them financial benefits and choice

Generally reduce taxation, and consequently reduce the services it pays for and/or increase government productivity and reduce waste.

Let everyone vote on each specific issue that is proposed and spending targets. Do away with blanket party manifestos and vote on individual proposals.
